Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via: Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Dvision, due to, street blockage, near Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Dvision, due to, street blockage, near Division/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Morse. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Morse.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at 63rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at 63rd/Cottage Grove due to a signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at 63rd/Cottage Grove due to a signal problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
